title: Tod B. Sloan, MD Anesthesiology Fund
description: To provide support for the Department of Anesthesiology in the School of Medicine at the Anschutz Medical Campus in honor of Tod B. Sloan, MD.  If $25,000 is raised within five years, the gifts will be invested as a permanent endowment.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Department of Anesthesiology in the School of Medicine at the Anschutz Medical Campus in honor of Tod B. Sloan, MD.  If $25,000 is raised within five years, the gifts will be invested as a permanent endowment.
